mapper.insert: insert into checkbible(user_id, bible_id, isCheck, lastdate) values(#{user_id},#{bible_id},1,NOW())
mapper.select: select bible_id, isCheck from checkBible where user_id= #{user_id}
SELECT list, chapter, verse FROM bible WHERE bible_id = (SELECT bible_id FROM checkbible where user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY lastdate DESC LIMIT 1);
